actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: To rescind certain budget authority proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on March 10, 1992, in accordance with section 1012 of the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
short_title: Appropriations Accountability and Deficit Reduction Act of 1992

summary.text: Appropriations Accountability and Deficit Reduction Act of 1992 - Rescinds certain budget authority proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on March 10, 1992, in accordance with the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974, for: (1) operation and maintenance for the Army, Navy, and Defense agencies; and (2) research and development activities for the Army, Air Force, and Defense agencies.

titles.title: Appropriations Accountability and Deficit Reduction Act of 1992

To rescind certain budget authority proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on March 10, 1992, in accordance with section 1012 of the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
